properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paraloka rajyamu cherutaku prabhu Yesu margambu Marga satya jeevamu neneyani Yesu palkenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarvalokula papa pariharardamu sri Yesu Parisudha rakthamu chindinche baliyayenu sri Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papapariharardam papa rakthamu nichena Yesuni chera priyuda samsayamadiyela{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu preminche pranamu nekai pettina Yesune Naku valadanchu velluta nyayama priyuda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maraninchina Yesu prabhuvu mudavanadu lechenu Mahima prabavamuto Yesu maranamu gelchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Takshaname maaru manassu nondi Yesuni nammina Rakshana nondedavu nichayamugano priyuda{/lang-eng}
